 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּט‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Josh.2.18|Josh 2:18]]</sup> ==thread, cord, line== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּטָא‎</span>) — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> absolute [[Gen.14.23|Gen 14:23]] + 2 t.; construct [[Josh.2.18|Josh 2:18]]+ 3 t.; — 

**1.** ***thread***, as easily broken [[Judg.16.12|Judg 16:12]] (simile); as composing a rope or cord; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁנִי הַזֶּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקְוַת ח‎</span> [[Josh.2.18|Josh 2:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) ***this cord of scarlet thread*** (literally the cord of this thread of scarlet); probably also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִחוּט וְעַד שְׂרוֺךְ נַעַל‎</span> [[Gen.14.23|Gen 14:23]] ***from a thread to a sandal-thong***; in simile <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁנִי‎</span> [[Song.4.3|Song 4:3]] ***like a thread of scarlet*** are thy lips. 

**2.** cord, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּשֻׁלָּשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַח‎</span> [[Eccl.4.12|Eccl 4:12]] ***a three-fold cord.*** 

**3.** ***line***, as measure of length [[1Kgs.7.15|1Kgs 7:15]] ***and a line of twelve cubits surrounded*** (i.e. would surround) ***it*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָו‎</span> v[[1Kgs.7.23|1Kgs 7:23]]), so [[Jer.52.21|Jer 52:21]]. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִוִּי‎</span> see below II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוה‎</span>.
